title: Bitcoinking99
author: Bitcoinking99
created_time: August 22, 2022, 05:41:18 PMLast edit: September 04, 2022, 04:15:41 PM by Bitcoinking99
content: 1. The bounty campaign will be managed by  Bitcoinking Bounty group    2.All participants must join BIDZ Coin  Telegram group, Discord and Intragram  page2. All participants must join Bounty telegram group3. Refrain from promoting talking about bounty programs in project chat groups.An immediate ban from company chat groups. Please ask your bounty-related questions in our bounty group.4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior may result in your being rejected.5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming will get you disqualified from the bounty program and all your accounts will be permanently banned.6. Red Trust accounts will not be accepted in any way.7. All participants must submit their weekly reports to this bounty thread. For every week, you need to create new report. Anyone submitting the same work twice will be rejected.8. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty program.      Note: The reward distribution of BIDZ Coin bounty is  by project team.                                                               Twitter             20%                                                              Telegram        20%                                                                 Instagram.       20%                                                         Tik Tok              20%                                 Youtube          20%                       Reward: 1. 500-2999 followers - 5 Stakes/week2. 3000 - 5999 followers - 10 Stakes week3. 6000-8999 followers - 15 Stakes/week4. 9000 14,999 followers - 20 Stakes/week5. 15,000+ followers - 25 Stakes/week                     Rules1. Must follow BIDZ Coin  Twitter Page 2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 501 followers.3. Participants have to make new 2 tweet And 5 Retweet  per week4. Participants must use Hashtag: #bidzcoin #Play2Earn #bsc #cryptocurrency #bidz #wear2earn  #coin          Rewards:                    5 stakes/week1. Update your Telegram name to Your Name | BIDZCOIN  (Example: Bitcoinking | BIDZCOIN )2. Replace your profile picture with  BIDZ Coin Logo.Rules:1. Must join BIDZ Coin  Telegram group2. Write posts in the Crypto-currency  group (only quality posts accepted)3. If you write any spam message you will be banned immediately4. Max posts per week: 55. You can ask questions about our Bounty in official group, but do not Spam!6. Participants must use #bidzcoin #Play2Earn #bsc #cryptocurrency #bidz #wear2earn  #coin hashtags in every Post.                        Reward1. 500-2999 followers - 5 Stakes/week 2. 3000 - 5999 followers - 10 Stakes week3. 6000-8999 followers - 15 Stakes/week 4. 9000 14,999 followers - 20 Stakes/week5. 15,000+ followers - 25 Stakes/week                    Rules1. All participants must follow the Official Instagram Page of bidz Coin.2. Instagram account must be set to public so we can verify works.3. Participants have to copy & paste 5 different images from our official Instagram page with the following hashtags: #bidzcoin #Play2Earn #bsc #cryptocurrency #bidz #wear2earn                 Reward1. 500+ views: 1 stakes/week2. 2000+ views: 2 stakes/week3. 5000+ views: 3 stakes/week4. 10000+ views: 4 stakes/week5. 20000+ views: 5 stakes/week                                Rules:  1. TikTok accounts must have a minimum of 100 followers.2. Videos need to be unique and have at least 500 views to qualify.3. Videos need to be a minimum of 20 secs in length.4. Participant's short video contents must focus on a relevant topic about the project's features,latest project's token updates/development, etc.5. Participants have to shoot 3 unique videos for TikTok per week (maximum 1 video/day).6. Participants must use #bidzcoin #Play2Earn #bsc #cryptocurrency #bidz #wear2earn  #coin hashtags in every video.                    RewardHigh quality: 3 stakes (High quality video and >5000 views)Good quality: 2 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 views )Average quality: 1 stake (Average quality video and >700 views)                                 Rules:  1. Each participant must send 3 short videos per week.2. Participants must have at least 500+ youtube subscribers. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length.3. Participants' forum account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign.4. Video contents must focus on a relevant topic: project features, latest project's token updates, blockchain, etc.5. Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.6. High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.8. Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.9. All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website,Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.10. Please enter the producer's bounty details at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!11. By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.                         Week 1: 23/08 - 29/08
